amendment.description: Amendment sought to suspend the requirement for rules-based decisionmaking when unemployment or inflation significantly diverges from targets.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part C of House Report 114-341 to suspend the requirement for rules-based decisionmaking when unemployment or inflation significantly diverges from targets.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Heck (WA) amendment (A001) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Heck (WA).
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Heck (WA) amendment (A001) Failed by voice vote.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
